page.title: 13HOME LIFE..MYRECAIRNIE
page.content: Mrs.Smith started doing bed&breakfast in 1984, while the Open golf championship was taking place in St.Andrews. This venture proved so succesful that she decided to continue this summer. The majority of her guests are foreign visitors visiting this area. She works closely with the local tourist board who refer holiday makers to her. In her spare time Mrs.Smith enjoys flower arranging, curling and gardening (they do not grow vegetables but get a reasonable supply by bartering with neighbours). Her husband's hobbies include welding, making toys and a visit to the pub once a week. Mrs.Smith shops mainly in Cupar, Dundee and St.Andrews although vans deliver groceries, fish and lemonade to the farm, as well as usual milk and papers.
